General.Name: Assetwise Public Company Limited
General.Description: Assetwise Public Company Limited develops and sells real estate properties in Thailand. It develops low-rise and high-rise condominiums, and horizontal residential real estate projects, including single houses, townhomes, and home offices. The company also engages in the real estate development leasing, and real estate consignment and lease agency activities; and development of health rehabilitation. In addition, it provides intermediary services for international payment; and researches and invests in digital assets and technology. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
